data.eml:eml: A new highly cave-adapted trechine genus and species from northern Guizhou Province, China (Coleoptera, Carabidae, Trechinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tian, Mingyi (2017): A new highly cave-adapted trechine genus and species from northern Guizhou Province, China (Coleoptera, Carabidae, Trechinae). ZooKeys 643: 97-108, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.643.11050, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.643.11050
